spell.druids.chain.name: Galvanic Contagion
spell.druids.chain.description: {damage}_0 Lightning | {damage}_1 Soul | {damage}_2 Arcane. Shoot a chaining projectile at an enemy.
spell.druids.voltaic_burst.name: Voltaic Burst
spell.druids.voltaic_burst.description: {damage}_0 Lightning | {damage}_1 Soul | {damage}_2 Arcane. Receive or increment a refreshing, de-incrementing buff that scales your relevant powers as well as spell haste for 2 seconds, shortened by spell haste. You perform a nova each time this buff expires.
spell.druids.spiritbolts.name: Spirit Bolts
spell.druids.spiritbolts.description: Up to {damage}_0 Soul, {damage}_1 Frost, or {damage}_2 Fire DPS. Channel to shoot soul, fire, or frost bolts, based on the weights of your Spell Powers. When you shoot out a bolt, you get a temporary buff for the elements not chosen.
spell.druids.stormcall.name: Storm Call
spell.druids.stormcall.description: {damage}_0 Lightning | {damage}_1 Soul 4 times a second. Call a storm at your location.
spell.druids.soulflare.name: Soul Flare
spell.druids.soulflare.description: {damage} Soul 2 times a second. Launch a ball of soul energy that carries enemies in the direction it is moving.
spell.druids.tendrils.name: Storm Surge
spell.druids.tendrils.description: Channel to smite enemies in front of you, having less chance to work per enemy over 4 in the area. Deals 1.5x Lightning and Arcane DPS.
spell.druids.lightningblast.name: Soul Smite
spell.druids.lightningblast.description: {damage}_0 Lightning | {damage}_1 Soul. Target an enemy to smite it and nearby enemies.
spell.druids.galvanic_rite.name: Soul Shock
spell.druids.galvanic_rite.description: Blast an enemy with arcane energy for 0.45x Soul and Arcane, gaining 1 stack of Lightning Power for 10 seconds, up to 5.
spell.druids.maelstromtotem.name: Maelstrom Totem
spell.druids.maelstromtotem.description: {damage}_0 Soul | {damage}_1 Frost {damage}_2 | Fire 4 times a second. Summon a Maelstrom Totem at the target block or surface, which in turn summons three vortexes spiraling around it.
spell.druids.soulfirebastion.name: Soulfire Bastion
spell.druids.soulfirebastion.description: Toggle between two defensive buffs, performing a damaging nova based on either Soul and Absorption or Fire and Health upon toggling, and setting yourself to half of the relevant hearts. Cleansing Flame regenerates 60%% of your wounds over 4 seconds (Stacking with Determination). Eternal Youth sacrifices 90%% of your health to gain 20 Reabsorption. Shift while casting to instead remove the buff.
